trans-unit.source: Contains arguments associated with changes to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" />.
trans-unit.target: Contiene argomenti associati alle modifiche a un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" />.

trans-unit.source: Attached events supported by this delegate include are provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager> class, and include <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInput>), <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputStart>), and <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputUpdate>).
trans-unit.target: Gli eventi associati supportati da questo delegato forniti dal <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager> classe e includere <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInput>), <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputStart> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputStart>), e <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInputUpdate> (<xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInputUpdate>).

trans-unit.source: The input device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Dispositivo di input associato a questo evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> object associated with this event.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs" /> class, taking a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputDevice" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> as initial values for the class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventArgs" />, accettando un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.InputDevice" /> specificato e <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> come valori iniziali della classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets control text associated with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il testo del controllo associato a un evento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" />.

trans-unit.source: A string containing any control text associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene il testo del controllo associato a questo evento.

trans-unit.source: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
trans-unit.target: Gestore generico da chiamare nella modalità specifica del tipo.

trans-unit.source: The target to call the handler on.
trans-unit.target: Destinazione sulla quale chiamare il gestore.

trans-unit.source: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.
trans-unit.target: Richiama i gestori eventi in una modalità specifica del tipo, che può aumentare l'efficienza del sistema di eventi.

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the generic handler as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventHandler> and then invokes it.
trans-unit.target: Questa implementazione esegue il cast del gestore generico come un <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventHandler> e quindi lo richiama.

trans-unit.source: For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni dettagliate su questo modello di implementazione e per i motivi, vedere <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> e [indirizzato Cenni preliminari sugli eventi](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets system text associated with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il testo del sistema associato a un evento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" />.

trans-unit.source: A string containing any system text associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene il testo del sistema associato a questo evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets input text associated with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il testo di input associato a un evento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" />.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the input text associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene il testo di input associato a questo evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> associated with a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> associato a un evento <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> object containing the text composition associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.TextComposition" /> che contiene la composizione di testo associato a questo evento.
